item.description:
Let's head down to Salem Willows for

People-Watching BINGO

 

Are you asking what is People-Watching BINGO???

Game:
I will provide the bingo cards which will be filled with all the items that you will need to find whether it be on a person or in the general area of the willows, you don't have to talk to anyone, just have a good eye.

 

What you need to bring:

A chair if you decide that you want to sit down, a pen and most of all your sense of humor.  You can play for as long as you want come visit with some awesome friends, play some video games and check out the sites and sounds.

This is meant for a fun and different way to spend time having a fun with friends.  So come on down to the Willow's and try something totally different, a little crazy and a lot of fun.

 

We will only wait 15 minutes for you to arrive at the meeting place, please remember that if you are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, the meetup phone number is:  978-304-2811.

Remember if you have not paid your dues this year, this event would be a good opportunity to do so.  We thank you for paying your dues.

Remember to change your RSVP to an event if your plans change.

Looking forward to seeing you down at the Willows!

Donna
item.how_to_find_us: We will be on the corner of Fort Ave and Restaurant Row, when we all get there we will look for the perfect viewing spot
item.name: A FUN day at Salem Willows...
